description: From Middle English holily, holyly, holilie, holiliche, holyliche, haliliche, haliʒlike, haliliʒ, from Old English hāliġlīċe, equivalent to holy +‎ -ly.

adverbs.description: holily (comparative more holily, superlative most holily)

entries.meaning: In a holy way; with sanctity.
examples: […]  enjoyning them upon the severest Penalties to live godlily, holily and righteously in this present World  […]
